thread.section_title: ezCater Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of ezCater | www.ezcater.com
thread.title: crystal

author: crystal
title: crystal
text:
i've been using ezcater for almost a year for catering for our company. i will say, if you work with a certain catering company frequently, it can sometimes be cheaper to order directly from them, but then you don't get the ezcater rewards points.
last week i had a couple of cancellations on my order, at the fault of the caterers. ez cater called me each time, troubleshooted for me and made sure i had catering when i needed it. they were all very nice and made sure i stayed within budget. i will recommend them to everyone, and will continue to use them.
